name: Warriors @ Amazon
description: Our mission is to aid veterans during their transition into Amazon workforce and to be a resource for Veteran and military spouse recruiting.

name: The Black Employee Network (BEN)
description: BEN's main focus is to support the Black employees at Amazon in whatever way they see fit, and to promote diversity within the company.

name: Asians @ Amazon
description: Asians at Amazon is committed to serving as a platform to promote cultural exchange and awareness among Asian cultures and between Asian and non-Asian cultures.
